entry.title: Turquoise Stretch Spandex Folding Chair Cover with Metallic Glittering Back
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2120
Type: Chair Covers
Price: 3.59 - 990.84 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Chair Cover
Front Material: 4-way Stretch Spandex
Back Material: Glitter Stretch Spandex
Color: Turquoise
Top-Bottom Chair Height: 36"
Chair Width: 16"
Note: Will not fit banquet style chairs or the larger LIFETIME folding style chairs.
There are pockets on chair cover for chair legs.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]


 

Spandex Banquet Chair Cover

Combining the seamless luster of premium quality spandex with the glamorous glint of metallic glitter, these four-way stretchable chair covers will ooze timeless elegance and regal appeal to your party space. This stylish duo of sleek stretch spandex front and glitzy glittered back will instantly add a “wow” factor to your party ambiance.

Durable and Reusable

Besides being dreamily dazzling, these heavy-duty chair covers are equally affordable, reusable, and durable. The attributes of stain and wrinkle resistance make these fab covers a perfect choice for indoor and outdoor events, holiday parties, weddings and other festive celebrations.

  
 

Multi-Use

Create a perfectly dashing duet of glimmer and glamour by complementing these glistening spandex chair covers with our spandex chair sashes and caps in wedding, showers, banquet events, corporate affairs, quinceanera parties etc. 

 

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
  • Uses: Party Chair Covers, Banquet Chair Covers, Wedding Chair Covers, Dining Chair Covers

entry.title: Metallic Red Glittering Shiny Premium Spandex Banquet Chair Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2110
Type: Chair Covers
Price: 5.09 - 1404.84 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Chair Cover
Material: Lam'e Spandex
Color: Metallic Red
GSM: 190
Chair Back: 17" height x 15" width
Chair Seat: 16" length x 15" width
Chair Legs: 15" height (from ground)
Deep Foot Pockets: Perfect for keeping the Chair covers fitted and fixed
Features: 4 Ways Stretch, Opaque, Durable, Stain and Wrinkle Free
Fits banquet style chairs. It Will not fit folding style chairs
Water-Resistant Outer Fabric, Inner (not water-resistant)
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Stretches 4 ways, flexible on the size. Fabric has about a 33% stretch ability, which means a chair back of 15" wide stretches to 18", so the types of chairs this can fit can range broadly.
  • Fits banquet style chairs. Will not fit folding style chairs.
  • This is the real thing, real knit spandex, not polyester imitation.
  • Use alone or atop chair covers for wedding, parties, celebrations, graduations, or any special event.
  • How to Care: Hand Wash w/ Mild Soap, Hang to Dry
  • Note: There are pockets on chair cover for chair legs.

entry.title: Dusty Rose Spandex Stretch Folding Chair Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2120
Type: Chair Covers
Price: 2.69 - 746.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Chair Cover
Material: Premium Spandex
Color: Dusty Rose
Top: Rounded (ARCHED)
Top to bottom Height: 36"
Chair Width: 16"
Purchase Spandex Sashes
Purchase Sash Buckles
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


    [Information]

     

    Premium Quality Material

    Sleek, stretchy, and so very stylish! Our Stretch Spandex Chair Covers will make your party preparation time a breeze, thanks to its high wrinkle-resistant and crease-free attributes! No long and tiring hours of ironing needed now. These lovely chair covers are crafted from Spandex, also known as Lycra that is a wrinkle-free stretchable material. It expands effortlessly to adjust the size of the item you wish to drape.

    Durable and Easy-to-Care

    Our classy stretch spandex chair covers are highly durable, stretchable, and affordable. This means that now you can have that luxurious looking party ambiance while staying on budget! Our splendid stretchy spandex chair covers can be used time and time again, without any need for ironing and can easily be laundered countless times without losing their luster and charm. Create an elegant display of your banquet or wedding chairs by adorning your party chairs with these splendid beauties.

    Stain & Wrinkle Resistant

    Our stretch spandex chair covers display modern sophistication and affordable elegance. Create a perfectly bedazzling duet of luminosity and glamour by complementing these stretch spandex chair covers with spandex chair sashes and caps in wedding, showers, banquet events, corporate affairs, quinceanera parties, etc. This heavy-duty chair covers feature stain resistant and wrinkle resistant properties that make them a perfect choice for indoor and outdoor events, holiday parties, weddings and other festive celebrations where you desire to create an everlasting impression on your guests while still staying in budget.

     

    Additional Information:

    • Fits standard folding style chairs. Will not fit banquet style chairs or the larger LIFETIME folding style chairs.
    • How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
